mapper.select: SELECT M.ID , M.TITLE, M.CONTENT, M.CREATETIME, M.HANDLETIME, M.COMMITTIME, M.TYPE, M.STATUS, M.NOTES, SPONSOR_ID AS sponsorId, SPONSOR_NAME AS sponsorName, SPONSOR_DEP AS sponsorDep, HANDLER_ID AS handlerId, HANDLER_NAME AS handlerName, HANDLER_DEP AS handlerDep FROM MISSION M WHERE M.ID=#{missionId}

SELECT M.ID , M.TITLE, M.CONTENT, M.CREATETIME, M.HANDLETIME, M.COMMITTIME, M.TYPE, M.STATUS, M.NOTES, SPONSOR_ID AS sponsorId, SPONSOR_NAME AS sponsorName, SPONSOR_DEP AS sponsorDep, HANDLER_ID AS handlerId, HANDLER_NAME AS handlerName, HANDLER_DEP AS handlerDep FROM MISSION M WHERE M.STATUS = 1 OR (M.STATUS = 2 and exists (SELECT 1 FROM MISSION_HANDLE MH WHERE MH.MISIONID = M.ID and MH.STATUS = 0 and MH.TO_ID=#{handleId} ))
